name: repojet
title: RepoJet
description: Search repositories across multiple GitHub organizations with custom aliases, bookmarks, and quick clone support.
author: arashsheyda

commands.name: search-repos
commands.title: Search Repositories
commands.subtitle: Search repositories across multiple GitHub organizations
commands.description: Search repositories across multiple GitHub organizations directly from Raycast.

preferences.name: githubToken
preferences.title: GitHub Personal Access Token
preferences.description: Token with access to repositories (read-only is enough)

preferences.name: organizations
preferences.title: GitHub Organizations
preferences.description: GitHub organizations to search (e.g. org1, org2)

preferences.name: cloneDirectory
preferences.title: Clone Directory
preferences.description: Directory where repositories will be cloned (default: ~/Developer)

preferences.name: useSSH
preferences.label: Clone with SSH
preferences.description: Use SSH URLs instead of HTTPS for cloning

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
